item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Thursday, April 24, 2025 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. GitHub potential leaking of private emails and Hacker One ( points | 5 comments)
2. Oniguruma, a popular regex library, is archived, the project "ended" ( points | 8 comments)
3. You wouldn't steal a font ( points | 14 comments)
4. Avoid continue ( points | 33 comments)
5. I wrote to the address in the GPLv2 license notice and received the GPLv3 license ( points | 1 comment)

8. Bluefish ( points | 4 comments)
9. Requirements change until they don't ( points | 1 comment)
10. How Discord Indexes Trillions of Messages ( points | no comments)
11. How I Got Hacked: A Warning about Malicious PoCs ( points | 1 comment)
12. First Successful Lightning Triggering and Guiding Using a Drone ( points | 1 comment)
13. What If We Could Rebuild Kafka From Scratch? ( points | 1 comment)
14. How a 20 year old bug in GTA San Andreas surfaced in Windows 11 24H2 ( points | 4 comments)
15. Speeding up Ruby by rewriting C… in Ruby ( points | 1 comment)
16. Does using Rust really make your software safer? ( points | 48 comments)
17. 14 Advanced Python Features ( points | 24 comments)
18. QEMU version 10.0.0 released ( points | no comments)

21. Echo - Open Hardware Music Player ( points | 6 comments)
22. What is cosh(List(Bool))? Or beyond algebra: analysis of data types ( points | 6 comments)
23. Searchable Linux Syscall Table for x86_64 ( points | 6 comments)
24. MinC - OpenBSD-flavored cygwin-alike for running UNIX-y things on Windows ( points | 4 comments)
25. How to make an Android tablet respect my wish to stay on a WiFi with no internet access? ( points | 4 comments)
